Atlanta.Ellis Hotel: The Ellis Hotel, formerly known as the Winecoff Hotel, is located at 176 Peachtree Street NW, in downtown Atlanta, Georgia, USA. Designed by William Lee Stoddart, the 15-story building opened in 1913. It is located next to the former Macy's (at 180 Peachtree Street), which was built as the flagship Davison's. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on March 31, 2009.
